Change Log for OppiaMobile Platform Components¶

The OppiaMobile platform consists of 3 core components (server, client app and the Moodle export block). This page summarises the currently released versions of each of these and the changelog history for each.

OppiaMobile Server (Django)¶

  • OppiaMobile Server Change Log
    • v0.7.2 - not yet released
    • v0.7.1 - released 18 Feb 2015
    • v0.7.0 - released 11 Feb 2015
    • v0.6.0 - released 22 Dec 2014
    • Previous Versions

OppiaMobile Client App (Android)¶

  • OppiaMobile Android App Change Log
    • v51 (5.x) - not yet released
    • v50 (5.0.1) - released: 30 Dec 2014
    • v49 (5.0.0) - released beta version: 18 Nov 2014
    • v48 (4.1.2) - released: 1 Oct 2014

OppiaMobile export block for Moodle¶

  • OppiaMobile Moodle Block Change Log
    • vX - not yet released
    • v2015021800 - released: 18 Feb 2015
    • v2015011900 - released: 19 Jan 2015
    • v2014102900 - released: 29 Oct 2014
